data.oai_dc:dc: Microsatellite genotypes of Ruffed Grouse used in Jensen et al. 2019. Samples from Alberta were collected in the field from live birds as well as birds harvested by hunters. Samples from other areas (outside Alberta) were provided by the following museum collections: University of Alaska Museum, Burke Museum, and Field Museum of Natural History. The ReadMe file attached has information for both data files.
dispersal barriers|gene flow|landscape genetics|population genetics|ruffed grouse|population structure|microsatellite
